name: BW (GDevelop Jam)
description:
As planned, you are a bot of servicing an air mining platform, on the planet of which you are located, the combat vehicles of past wars gradually began to turn on, the platform was beaten and you, as the only functioning service bot, must restore it by creating a base, fighting off enemies, and going to their bases (google translate)

Control:

W - Jump

A - Left

D - Right

LMB - Fire

Experemental control:

B - Spawn turret

R - Turn turret

RMB - Turret fire

TurretV1

- High rate of fire

- Armor

- Low damage

- Poor accuracy and range

It looks like a turret with a machine gun installed:
